#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{ long long int i,j,k,n,N,l,L,count;
  scanf("%lld",&N);
  for(n=0;n<N;n=n+1)
   { scanf("%lld",&L);
     char a[10000]={'\0'};
     for(l=0;l<=L;l=l+1)
      {  if(l>0 && (l%26)==0)
           { a[l]='a';
             l=l+1;
             L=L+1;
           }
         a[l]=((l%26))+'a';
      }
      for(l=0;l<=L;l=l+1)
      { printf("%c",a[L-l]);
      }
     printf("\n");
   }
  return 0;
}
